```{r, comment = "", echo = FALSE, eval = FALSE}
sheets <- list.files(path = "./Sheets", full.names = TRUE)
names <- list.files(path = "./Sheets", full.names = FALSE)

for (n in 1:length(names)) {
        names[n] <- gsub(".pdf", "", names[n])
}

for (n in 1:length(sheets)) {
        sheets[n] <- paste0("[",names[n],"](",sheets[n],")")
}
```
